name: PixelVsPolygone
description: This two-player game is all about duality. Embodie a knight or a robot and explore your time period and face its own challenges. Each hero has its own gameplay and style (maybe you guessed that thanks to the title). The players will play their own level but they might encounter each other in some weird twisted place ! Command : 2D player (Keyboard) : - Go forward = D - Go back = Q - Jump = Z - Dash = Spacebar - Blaster = Shift left 3D player (Gamepad) : - Go forward / Go back = Left joystick - Sword = X / Square - Shield = RB /R1
